text: Piotr Rocki (January 11, 1974 – June 1, 2020) was a Polish football player. He was born in Warsaw. He played for Polonia Warsaw, Hetman Zamość, Górnik Zabrze, Odra Wodzisław Śląski and later for Dyskobolia Grodzisk Wielkopolski. His career lasted from 1990 to 2017. Rocki died on June 1, 2020 in Bytom, Poland after suffering from an aneurysm, aged 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from aneurysm Category:Polish footballers Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Piotr Rocki
